description: Triangle T(n,k): write n in base 4, reverse order of digits.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..1000 of triangle, flattened
prog: (PARI) A030386(n, k=-1)=/*k<0&&error("Flattened sequence not yet implemented.")*/n\4^k%4 \\ Assuming that columns are numbered starting with k=0 as in A030308, A030341, ... - M. F. Hasler, Jul 21 2013(Haskell)a030386 n k = a030386_tabf !! n !! ka030386_row n = a030386_tabf !! na030386_tabf = iterate succ [0] where   succ []     = [1]   succ (3:ts) = 0 : succ ts   succ (t:ts) = (t + 1) : ts-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 18 2015
